column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We were expecting an hour wait but when it grew longer
column2: I was on the verge of angry.  Our waitress was sweet but slow.   BUT then we ate the salad and pizza.  We got the Lou Malnati salad
column3: and the two main deep dish pizzas.  So delicious.  Worth the wait?  I'm glad we got it before we left Chicago but next time
column4: I would go at an off time.
